product_name: Adventure Medical Kits Travel Medic First-Aid Kit
long_description: Treat minor injuries and ease discomforts associated with travel with the Adventure Medical Travel Medic first-aid kit. Kit includes 4 Diotame tablets, 4 antacid tablets and 2 Diamode tablets to relieve discomfort due to upset stomach and diarrhea. 4 ibuprofen tablets, 4 acetaminophen tablets and 2 antihistamine pills knock out pain, fever and allergies. Treat blisters with 11 precut and shaped Moleskin patches, 3 alcohol swabs and 1 GlacierGel(R) blister and burn dressing. 5 adhesive bandages, 3 anesthetic/antiseptic wipes, 2 butterfly closures and 1 small package of triple antibiotic ointment help you care for cuts and scrapes. 2 safety pins come in handy for clothing repairs and other uses. 2 wash-up towelettes let you clean up after treating an injury. Assembled in the USA of imported and domestic materials.
short_description: Treat minor injuries and ease discomforts associated with travel with the Adventure Medical Travel Medic first-aid kit.
